Action Description
Pan
ALT + LEFT MOUSE CLICK + DRAG 		Pans window
Zoom in/out
MOUSE WHEEL IN/OUT 		Zooms in/out
Move Object (Down/Up/Left/Right)
(Down/Up/Left/Right) Arrow 		Moves Selected in the given direction
Rotate Object (Down/Up/Left/Right)
SHIFT + (Down/Up/Left/Right) Arrow 		Rotates Selected in the given direction
Delete Object
DEL 		Deletes Selected Object
